name: Crompton SunBrown Deluxe Pop-up Toaster 800W with Removable Crumb Tray | 7 Browning Levels with Reheat, Defrost & Cancel Function | Dust Cover Plate | White Cool Touch Body
desc: PRODUCT DESCRIPTION – Crompton's SunBrown Deluxe pop-up toaster comes with 7 level browning control that guarantees crispy bread within 2 minutes with the desired amount of charring. Thanks to the Auto Bread Centering technology, bread is toasted uniformly and quickly. You can accommodate thicker slices of bread in its 38mm wide bread slots. With multi-functional buttons that help to reheat, defrost, and cancel operations, SunBrown Deluxe pop-up toaster is compact in design and comes with an aesthetically attractive cool touch body. This toaster also comes with a removable crumb tray and dust cover plate that help keep the product clean.

REHEAT, DEFROST, CANCEL – Reheat toasted bread, Defrost fridge stored bread, Cancel any process. In addition to all these functions having dedicated buttons to them, they each have a LED backlight that glows to indicate which function is in operation.

HYGIENE – SunBrown Deluxe comes with a removable crumb tray for easy cleaning. The product also has a white colour dust cover plate that helps keeping the bread slots clean by preventing dust, dirt, moisture, and insects from entering the bread slots.
TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS – 700W Power; Capacity: 2-Slice pop-up toaster; Power Cord: 1.2 meters
WARRANTY – 2 years warranty on product.

desc: HEALTHIER LIFESTYLE With CONVENIENCE: Featuring Air Crisp Technology of 360° hot air convection system with high power (temperature range: 80 ° C to 200 ° C), INALSA air fryer shortens your cooking time by 50% faster comparing to traditional ovens, an ideal time & energy saver! name: Lifelong Mixer Grinder for Kitchen - 4 Jars 500 Watt Mixie - 2 Nutri bullet Jars for Smoothie & Blending, Chutney Jar & Liquidizing Jar used as Wet Grinder & Blender - Stainless Steel Blades (LLMG39)
desc: 2 Stainless Steel Jars and 2 Nutri Bullet Jars: Lifelong's mixer grinder, functioning as a juicer mixer grinder, comes with 2 stainless steel jars and 2 Nutri Bullet jars, each equipped with PP lids to securely hold contents in place, preventing spills and ensuring intact storage.
Powerful 500W Motor: Experience efficient grinding, even with challenging materials like black whole gramme (dal), making it perfect for creating delicious vadas and dosas.

3 Speed Operation: The speed regulating knob is a smart feature which serves your purpose of adjusting varying speed limits. Now, you can take control over your kitchen by regulating the grinding or mixing process of your food items with the speed regulating option coming in handy.

Multi-Purpose Functionality: This durable mixer grinder, acting as a grinder for kitchen use, features 4 jars with multi-purpose blades, ideal for grinding raw masalas, creating delicious pastes, and preparing smoothies and juices.
Incher Feature: The incher or pulse feature runs the blades momentarily, gently pushing bulk dry ingredients upwards and freeing any material stuck on the jar wall, ensuring thorough blending.

Initial Usage Caution: Don't worry if you notice a slight burning smell during the first run of your mixer grinder; this is normal and caused by the motor varnish heating up for the first time. The issue should not persist in subsequent uses.
The Box Includes: 1 N Mixer Grinder, 2 N Stainless Steel Jars, 2 N Nutri Bullet Jars, 2 N Caps, 1 N User Manual, 1 N Warranty Card
